definition: To no longer possess or have something that was previously owned or held, often due to misplacement, defeat, or failure. It is commonly used to describe the act of losing in a game, competition, or battle, as well as losing personal belongings or losing track of time.

examples.german: Wir dürfen dieses Spiel nicht verlieren.
examples.english: We must not lose this game.

examples.german: Der Verein hat das Spiel verloren.
